entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is described as being excited to unwrap his new broom and is mentioned multiple times in the conversation.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as one of the new prefects and is referred to by name in the conversation.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned multiple times in the conversation and is referred to by name.

entities.name: fred
entities.description: Fred is mentioned as rolling his eyes at Mrs. Weasley's comment.

entities.name: george
entities.description: George is mentioned alongside Fred and Ginny.

entities.name: ginny
entities.description: Ginny is mentioned as being present in the room.

entities.description: Kingsley Shacklebolt is mentioned as already being at the dinner party.

entities.name: mad-eye moody
entities.description: Mad-Eye Moody is mentioned as arriving shortly after Harry.

entities.name: mrs. weasley
entities.description: Mrs. Weasley is described as being in a better mood than usual and is referred to by name multiple times.

entities.name: bill
entities.description: Bill is mentioned as being on his way to the dinner party.

entities.name: new broom
entities.description: The new broom is described as being unwrapped by Ron and examined in detail.

relationships.description: Ron has the new broom and is excited to examine it.
Mrs. Weasley is Ron's mother and is proud of his new prefect position.
Harry knows Mad-Eye Moody and greets him when he arrives.
Mrs. Weasley is married to Bill.
Ron and Hermione are friends and both become prefects.
